snippet: A decision in Virginia striking down a ban on same-sex marriage is just the latest in a series of lower court rulings on the issue.
abstract: News analysis; sweeping decision striking down Virginia's ban on same-sex marriage continues winning streak for gay rights advocates, putting renewed pressure on the Supreme Court to rule definitively on issue's constitutionality; pace of change has accelerated rapidly since court's narrow ruling in June 2013, with federal judges, state legislatures and state courts joining growing public consensus.
lead_paragraph: A decision in Virginia striking down a ban on same-sex marriage is just the latest in a series of lower court rulings on the issue.

headline.main: A Steady Path to Supreme Court as Gay Marriage Gains Momentum in States
headline.print_headline: A Steady Path to the Justices

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
